name: Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel
description:
Brand: Parachute SkinPure    Product Benefits: Makes Skin Glowy, Hydrated & Soft    Item Form: Gel    Material Type Free: Paraben Free     Skin Type: All Skin Types    Liquid Volume: 100 ML    Special Feature: Soothes Sunburn • Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel: Enriched with 99% Aloe Vera, Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel offers comprehensive care for your face and skin. This gentle yet potent formula is designed to heal, repair, and protect your skin, providing essential nourishment for a healthy and radiant complexion.    • Healing and Repairing Properties: With its high concentration of Aloe Vera, this gel is highly effective in healing and repairing damaged skin. Aloe Vera is renowned for its soothing and anti-inflammatory properties, which help to calm irritation, reduce redness.     • Moisturizing Benefits: Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel keeps the skin moisturized, providing long-lasting hydration to prevent dryness and flakiness. Regular use of this gel helps to maintain the skin's natural moisture balance, leaving it soft, smooth, and supple.    • Goodness of Niacinamide: Niacinamide helps with spots & mark reduction providing naturally glowing skin • Soothing Sunburn Relief: Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel offers soothing relief for sunburned skin. Its cooling and anti-inflammatory properties help to alleviate discomfort, reduce redness, and promote healing after sun exposure. Applying this gel to sunburned areas provides instant relief, helping to calm irritation and restore the skin's natural balance.    • Versatile Application: This Aloe Vera gel can be applied directly onto the face as a moisturizer or used as a face mask for an extra boost of hydration and nourishment. Its lightweight and non-greasy formula make it suitable for daily use, providing instant relief and comfort to tired and stressed skin. It can also be used as a hair mask.

name: Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel
description:
Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel is 99% pure Aloe Vera enhanced with glow boosters, which soothe & nourish skin from the inside. A 5 minutes massage every-day gives you skin that is spotless, glowing and soft to the touch.

name: Tibet Pomade
description:
Product Type: Pomade Brand: Tibat Size: 50mlMade from premium quality Rose Oil, pure petroleum jelly added with mineral oils and a refreshing fragrance. Protects skin from dryness, it penetrates through layers of skin to cure cracked lips, ankle and feet.

name: Emami Fair And Handsome Fairness Cream
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India. Emami Fair And Handsome Fairness Cream (30 gm) is a skincare product formulated to provide a brighter, more even complexion for men. It's marketed as a fairness cream that also helps to reduce dark spots, even skin tone, and provide a fresh, radiant appearance. Ingredients:Vitamin E: Helps nourish the skin and protect it from environmental damage.Licorice Extract: Known for its skin-lightening properties, helping to reduce dark spots and even out skin tone.Glycerin: Moisturizes the skin, keeping it soft and hydrated​. Use: Emami Fair and Handsome Fairness Cream is designed for daily use. It can be applied to clean, dry skin, typically after washing the face. It helps to lighten skin over time, giving a more uniform complexion and improving skin radiance. This cream is also formulated to prevent oil buildup, making it suitable for oily skin as well​.
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India.

Vitamin E: Helps nourish the skin and protect it from environmental damage.
Licorice Extract: Known for its skin-lightening properties, helping to reduce dark spots and even out skin tone.
Glycerin: Moisturizes the skin, keeping it soft and hydrated​.
 
Use: Emami Fair and Handsome Fairness Cream is designed for daily use. It can be applied to clean, dry skin, typically after washing the face. It helps to lighten skin over time, giving a more uniform complexion and improving skin radiance. This cream is also formulated to prevent oil buildup, making it suitable for oily skin as well​.

name: Garnier Body Bright Complete Serum Milk UV
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from France. Garnier Light Extra Milk Lotion is a nourishing and hydrating body lotion designed to leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and radiant. This generous 400 ml bottle contains a specialized formula that combines the benefits of milk and lotion to provide deep moisturization and care for your skin. Garnier, a brand known for its commitment to skincare innovation, offers you a product that helps you achieve beautifully moisturized and healthy-looking skin.

name: Emami Fair And Handsome Fairness Cream
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India. Ingredients: It includes Vitamin E, and other skin-friendly ingredients that help in oil control, dark spot reduction, and skin fairness​. Use: This cream is specially formulated for men and is designed to help reduce dark spots, oiliness, and provide sun protection. It also works to improve skin fairness and radiance. Ideal for daily use, it is recommended to apply a small amount on your face and neck after cleansing​.

name: Boroline Ayurvedic Cream
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India. Boroline Ayurvedic Cream 20 gm is an iconic skincare product that combines traditional Ayurvedic wisdom with modern formulations. It is a versatile and multipurpose cream that provides relief and care for various skin concerns. With its healing and protective properties, Boroline is a household name in India, trusted by generations for its effectiveness in addressing a variety of skin issues.

name: Cute Cold Cream
description:
One of Cute’s flagship products, Cute cold cream, has been in homes around Bangladesh for 4 decades. Its excellent quality has made it the first choice of people for winter.  Healthy skin requires nearly 90% water, which gives them strength and flexibility to protect your skin. The natural oils found in your skin can be removed through normal activities throughout the day stripping the required natural moisture protection. Without the necessary moisture, your skin's protective barrier degrades, which allows even more moisture to escape. Cute cold cream replenishes the necessary moisture and nutrients and locks in moisture needed to help keep your skin healthy and beautiful every day. INGREDIENTS: ·Liquid paraffin ·Bizz wax  · Distilled water ·Glycerin monostearate · Petroleum jelly · Perfume.

name: Nivea Creme All Purpose Cream
description:
• Pamper your skin with the formula of NIVEA Creme which not only cares but also protects your skin leaving it healthy and moisturized.• It’s an all-purpose creme that you can use for everyone in the family, making it the perfect moisturizer for all seasons!• It is suitable for usage on all types of skin.How To Use:Step 1 - Scoop the product.  Step 2 - Rub it on your palms to spread evenly.Step 3 - Gently massage all over your face and body.  Step 4 - Use daily for soft and fresh skin.

name: Studio X Power Brightening Cream 60 gm & Glo-On Pink Glow Cream 50 gm Combo
description:
Studio X Brightening Cream:  A man's journey to style is tough. To look stylish, his face needs to win against multiple attackers of style such as oilness, dark spots, sweat and dullness. Studio X Power Brightening Cream is designed by International Style Experts to fight against all the style attackers and make your skin look oil free, instantly fair.    It has a unique Menz Formula powered with 5 in 1 Brightening Booster Technology to fight with daily attackers & give you long lasting brightness for that stylish look everyday.    Glo-On Pink Glow Cream:  Introducing the all new GLO-ON PINK GLOW CREAM, with all new American skin technology, Vitamin B3, C, E, Pep Complex and 2 Glow Molecules to give you back your labonnomoi pink glow
